name: Animal Blast - Match 4 Game
description:
TAP, BLAST & COLLECT THE ANIMALS!

The ultimate matching puzzle game with unique gameplay! It's Animal Blast time!

Match four or more identical animals to clear each level. But be careful, your moves and time are limited and you will lose points if you only match three!

Animal blast features:

- Stunning graphics
- Unique gameplay
- All kinds of cutest animals
- So many levels with exciting puzzles
- Easy and fun to play but challenging to master
- Facebook invite and compete with your friends!
- Reach the top scores on Game Center
